segments.text: No , that's not right . I didn't order a coffee . I ordered a cola .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I'm terribly sorry , sir . I'll go and get you cola right away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . I'll bring your drink right away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's not that . There's an animal in my soup .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there , sir ? I'm very sorry . I'll change it straight away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've never been to such a dirty restaurant , and never seen such slow service .
segments.speaker: S2
